trump_roasts.headline: Trump Announces New Tariffs
trump_roasts.script:
Abraham Lincoln! Six foot four! Freed the slaves and MORE!

Trump Announces New Tariffs.

AMERICA! This man got POOR people defending a BILLIONAIRE!

I grew up in a LOG CABIN. Not Trump Tower!

He bankrupted CASINOS. The HOUSE always wins! Unless Trump owns it!

You POOR folks defending him? He wouldn't piss on you if you was on FIRE!

April 14 1865. I died for THIS?

Bitcoin bc1qaeylk80cz3cd9ckxlyuedyq9eupeqhaujk2plt

trump_roasts.headline: Trump Rally Draws Thousands
trump_roasts.script:
Abraham Lincoln! Honest Abe! Still speaking from the GRAVE!

Trump Rally Draws Thousands.

This billionaire convinced YOU he understands poverty!

I split rails. He splits checks at Mar-a-Lago!

You cheer while he laughs at you behind closed doors!

Wake UP America!

Bitcoin bc1qaeylk80cz3cd9ckxlyuedyq9eupeqhaujk2plt

police_roasts.headline: Police Violence Protests Continue
police_roasts.script:
Abraham Lincoln! The tall guy! Got shot at theater!

Police Violence Protests Continue.

AMERICA! You got people with BADGES acting like GANGS!

I preserved the Union. You're tearing it apart!

Protect and serve? Serve WHO?

Everyone's complicit. Cops. Politicians. YOU for staying silent!

Bitcoin bc1qaeylk80cz3cd9ckxlyuedyq9eupeqhaujk2plt

education_roasts.headline: Education System Failing Students
education_roasts.script:
Abraham Lincoln! Self-educated! Read by candlelight!

Education System Failing Students.

I taught MYSELF law. You can't even teach basic reading!

Teachers underpaid. Students unprepared. System BROKEN!

And you just accept it? Generation after generation FAILING?

You're ALL responsible!

Bitcoin bc1qaeylk80cz3cd9ckxlyuedyq9eupeqhaujk2plt

economy_roasts.headline: Stock Market Crashes Again
economy_roasts.script:
Abraham Lincoln! Died in 1865! Still watching your GREED!

Stock Market Crashes Again.

You gamble with people's LIVES! Call it economics!

Rich get richer. Poor get poorer. Tale old as time!

But YOU enable it! Your votes. Your silence. Your COMPLICITY!

Everyone's guilty!

Bitcoin bc1qaeylk80cz3cd9ckxlyuedyq9eupeqhaujk2plt

general_roasts.headline: America in Crisis
general_roasts.script:
Abraham Lincoln! Honest Abe! Still speaking from the GRAVE!

America in Crisis.

AMERICA! People with POWER doing NOTHING!

I died believing in progress. You're ALL complicit!

Rich exploiting. Poor suffering. Everyone pointing fingers!

Look in mirrors!

Bitcoin bc1qaeylk80cz3cd9ckxlyuedyq9eupeqhaujk2plt

general_roasts.headline: Government Shutdown Continues
general_roasts.script:
Abraham Lincoln! Freed the slaves! Preserved the Union!

Government Shutdown Continues.

You PAY these politicians to NOT WORK!

I governed through CIVIL WAR. You can't pass a budget?

Pathetic. All of you. Politicians AND voters!

Bitcoin bc1qaeylk80cz3cd9ckxlyuedyq9eupeqhaujk2plt
